content.query:
--SQL DEDIDCADO
CREATE TABLE dbo.SILVER_CLIENTE_SCD
	(
	 [ID_CLIENTE] int,
	 [NOME_CLIENTE] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ENDERECO] nvarchar(4000),
	 [NUMERO] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ID_CIDADE] int,
	 [CEP] nvarchar(4000),
     [InsertedDate] [datetime] NOT NULL,
     [ModifiedDate] [datetime] NOT NULL,
     [HashKey] [char](64)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO
